name: LD50: Lokat's Revenge
description:
You may eventually remember the beast from LD46.

You failed to satisfy Lokat and now, it is coming to wreck your house. All of your precious belongings will be destroyed … UNLESS ! Unless you are able to defend your belongings by splashing the monster with your Anti-cat-water-gun !

In Lokat’s Revenge you have to switch over 4 rooms to protect your precious goods from the wandering cat that just want to make them fall. But you do know what will happen… The mischiefing cat will absolutely reach one of the beloved goodies, because eh, it’s a cat !

Commands :

Switch rooms with LEFT ARROW and RIGHT ARROW

Shoot with LEFT CLICK

A tutorial is available in-game if you want more details about the UI.
